most_active_tickets.title: Copilot is not giving any feedback

common_issues.title: Copilot Unresponsive, Constant Loading
common_issues.description: Users across different operating systems (Windows, macOS, Linux) report Copilot unresponsiveness.  Copilot continuously loads without generating responses in conversations within the app or extensions. Some conversations may show summaries or name updates, but no chat responses.  Troubleshooting steps like resetting, restarting, reinstalling, and switching between On-Device and Cloud LLMs have been unsuccessful.  Log files contain repeated Sentry Event Errors. Further investigation into these errors is needed.

related_issues.title: Copilot not responding
related_issues.text:
Copilot not responding
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

PiecesOS: 11.3.3 - Pieces for Developers: 4.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Hey all,
Pieces Copilot no longer responds in conversations in the app, or through any of the extensions (VS Code/Chrome). It just keeps loading. I've tried hard-resetting, restarting, reinstalling, On-Device LLMs, and Cloud LLMs. The weird thing is, some of the conversations will have a summary or will update the name of the conversation, but it never responds in the chat. I looked at the logs and saw repeated Sentry Event Errors, but not sure what to do with that.  I attached the log file from the day before yesterday (yesterday's is too large and won't upload). What should I do?

Thanks!

[log-04292025.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/19997109/log-04292025.txt)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it.
